titleStmt.title: A letter from Maj. General Massey to an honourable person in London
titleStmt.author: Massey, Edward, Sir, 1619?-1674?
Massey, William, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Presumably fictitious; but the general referred to is clearly Sir Edward Massey--cf. NUC pre-1956, v. 368, p. 321.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
